title: Friends account hacked
body:
My friend (lets call him friend1) got a link from my other friend (and call him friend2). Friend1 opened this link and he now cant log into his account. Friend2 can but the hackers have access to his account (that account is sending links to loads of people and he isn't doing it). So mm and friend2 decided to try reset his password to prevent their access. The last step is to fill in the pass code it sent to your email. Sadly the hacker changed that account's email. This is all i have of that email "*******RBAA147@GMAIL.COM".  

Back to friend1. I spoke to the hacker, 1st trying to bait the link (i didn't have it at the time). He replied but he/she didn't seem to be English as it wasn't understandable. I eventually said i knew he is a hacker and so he blocked me. Friend1 can not log into his account at all.

I went onto the hacker's site and i checked the site's code. It uses another website called "hitwebcounter.com". I'm not sure how it works but i think it looks on your computer for your account details somehow. 

Sorry if i shouldn't have started a discussion. I'm new to the LoL forums and I'm panicking a bit. I just wanted to post this as soon as possible. There are more than those 2 people who have been hacked, the links seemed to have gotten everywhere (besides me for some reason). I am very sad and so are my friends at the lose of the accounts {{item:3070}}. I hope this is posted under the right board (like i said im new to the forums). Sorry for any inconvenient if any is caused!

Any help or advice would be appreciated a TON.

replies.body: This can definitely be fixed, no worries just yet! Have your friend reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and pick the subject "I need help recovering my account" asap! We should be able to verify him as the creator and get him secured again. We'll also be able to reverse any damage, so no worries there either.

Hi, so I'm the so called "friend2" and this is my main account, as my smurf got hacked. Just wanted to say that I sent a ticket and got a reply from Teyllara and I've sent a reply back. 
Thank you riot for the support and speedy reply, it would be great if the recovery of my account would be successful. Once again, thanks!
I have successfully completed the ticket and have submitted it.

Thank you so much! I will tell everyone who has been hacked (as there are a few) to do this. Unfortunately it's mid night so most of them won't be awake but   I will make sure they do this asap. 

Once again thank you.

Hey guys i am one of the guy who got hacked. And now i was forced to create a new account. I have learned my lesson to not trust any website regarding free rp, etc. I just want to ask if this problem can be fixed
Hey bud! Don't fret just yet, follow the steps I mentioned above to shoot us a ticket. We should be able to get you back into your old account so you won't lose anything!
Thank you so much! I will try the steps mentioned above right now.
